channel.title: A couple of easy ways to get round some school blocked sites
channel.description:
hi guys,
Me and my mate at school had been trying for a while to get round some school blocked sites, but the use of 3rd party programs we found very un-practicle and risky. We did however find 2 methods that any idiot can do that generally do work -
Firstly -
When google searching for a decent game or something the site you want is ussaly blocked yes, however if you simmply click the "cache" link inder the descriptive text it will however allow you to acess the site, most of the time.
Example -
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/4351/untitledhy8.jpg[/img][/URL]
Another method, and im surprised this achurly works lol, firstly go onto the site you want to go on.....But its blocked. Now if ure lucky enough to have I.E 7 at your school simply open that same link in a new tab and it will work!
Example -
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/1388/222ck6.png[/img][/URL]
Both these methods DO work, however if the site is blocked by the schools acess grid (like every school in your area) then they possibly might not..
Enjoy.

item.title: A couple of easy ways to get round some school blocked sites
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

I tried it out, in fact im on it right now
It works really well. If it doesnt work well for you id say try these:
MPScope.net
OverrideWebSense.com
Or just go to Proxy.org at your home comp and look up proxys there.
(it might be proxy.net i cant remember)

Read full topic
item.source: A couple of easy ways to get round some school blocked sites

item.title: A couple of easy ways to get round some school blocked sites
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:1, topic:100061”]I thought that it’d be sexy to host my own proxy web page. I’ve noticed some of the other ones are slower, so I thought you guys could use it too!

This, as far as I know, will let you get on blocked websites from school (As long as mine isn’t blocked).

Please click the ads, even if you’re not going to use it and are just taking a peak. The ad clicks will keep the site up.

www.pwnds.info/prox/[/quote]

Pwnd’s proxy. I haven’t tried it out but it sounds ok.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple of easy ways to get round some school blocked sites
item.dc:creator: @gokon gokon
item.description:
@gokon wrote:

[quote=“deoxys505, post:24, topic:86752”][quote author=3.65 kilos link=topic=127259.msg1335880#msg1335880 date=1179526049]
Everyone at my school uses allaboutabe.com for a proxy, when the page loads, click on the abe picture on the left and it will take you to the proxy.
[/quote]lol! at the top there is a button that says “IN CASE OF TEACHER” lol i find that funny.[/quote]yeah that button takes you to usatoday.com hah good if your supposed to be doing a current events project in history or whatever. its not the best proxy server, but yeh, its good.

Read full topic

Dude do you even know what cached is ? Its just a preview like a ss of the page your about to go to.
Thats the only page your gonna be able to see thats not blocked.

  • I tried it yesterday at school and it didnt work.

item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

they have yet to block my modifed PHProxy

proboly because i required a login so they cant verify it breaks school rules

the amount of traffic going to that site has to throw up some red flags
about 8 kids use it and access about 30 sites and each link/image loads thru the proxy
thats a lot of traffic in one day
